data.title: Bittensor price pops 18% to lead top gainers: what next for TAO?
data.description:
Bittensor’s native token TAO has surged 18% to $490. The altcoin has outpaced other top gainers amid a broader market uptick in AI-related projects. Bulls have eyes on a breakout above $500. Bittensor’s TAO token has experienced a sharp rise, climbing double digits to hover just shy of the $500 psychological barrier
source: https://coinjournal.net/news/bittensor-price-pops-18-to-lead-top-gainers-what-next-for-tao/

data.title: Breaking: Ripple Labs to Unlock 1 Billion XRP From Escrow in Hours
data.description:
In hours, blockchain payments firm Ripple Labs will release about 1 billion XRP from escrow. This liquidity shift is helping the company fuel XRP utility in a post-SEC lawsuit era. With new deals and rising share value, Ripple Labs is building momentum, strengthening XRP’s outlook digital treasury portfolios
source: https://www.thecoinrepublic.com/2025/10/31/breaking-ripple-labs-to-unlock-1-billion-xrp-from-escrow-in-hours/

data.title: Federal Reserve's Hammack Suggests Interest Rates May Remain Unchanged
data.description: According to BlockBeats, Federal Reserve official Hammack indicated a preference for maintaining current interest rates this week. Initial signs of weakness in the labor market, such as layoff announcements, have emerged. The current rates are estimated to be near neutral levels.

data.description: According to Foresight News, Bitcoin's value has dropped below 110,000 USDT, currently trading at 110,109.01 USDT. This marks a daily decrease of 1.56%.

data.title: Jump Crypto transferred $205 million in SOL to Galaxy Digital and received 2,455 BTC.
data.description: According to Lookonchain, Jump Crypto transferred 1.1 million unstakinged SOL (worth $205 million) to Galaxy Digital in the past 15 minutes and received 2,455 BTC (worth $265 million).

data.title: ZEC Surpasses XMR in Global Cryptocurrency Market Rankings
data.description: According to BlockBeats, CoinGecko data reveals that ZEC's market capitalization has risen to $6.273 billion, surpassing XMR's $6.039 billion. This increase positions ZEC as the 32nd largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization globally.

data.title: Altcoin Season Index Brightens Up To 32 As Bittensor, Zcash, And DeXe Advance
data.description:
Altcoin participation has widened from last week’s lull, with the Altcoin Season Index rising to 32, and that shift matters because it suggests risk is re-entering liquid names where order books can absorb size, funding is stabilizing, and execution quality allows larger tickets without excessive slippage, which together encourage programmatic re-engagement after a cautious stretch. Investors […]
source: https://cryptonews.com/news/altcoin-season-index-brightens-up-to-32-as-bittensor-zcash-and-dexe-advance/

data.title: Can Asia’s mid-caps absorb 30% of new BTC supply?
data.description:
Set against recurring billion-dollar ETF inflows, Asia’s mid-caps are starting to look like the next structural bid for bitcoin’s free float. Japan’s Metaplanet has surpassed 30,00 BTC on its balance sheet, and Korea’s Bitplanet initiated a supervised, rules-based accumulation program.
source: https://cryptoslate.com/can-asias-mid-caps-absorb-30-of-new-btc-supply/

data.title: Bernstein has given SharpLink an "Outperform" rating and is bullish with a 75% upside.
data.description: Research firm Bernstein officially launched its analysis coverage of SharpLink Gaming (NASDAQ: SBET) on October 30, giving it an "Outperform" rating and setting a year-end 2026 price target of $24, representing an upside of approximately 75% from the current share price. data.title: U.S. Appeals Court Upholds Federal Reserve's Decision Against Custodia
data.description: According to Foresight News, the U.S. Tenth Circuit Court of Appeals has ruled in favor of the Federal Reserve in a 2-1 decision, rejecting Custodia's request to compel the central bank to grant it a master account. This decision marks a significant development in the ongoing legal battle between Custodia and the Federal Reserve over access to central banking services.

data.title: Bitcoin Mining Goes Smart In Japan: CAN Deploys 4.5 MW To Support Grid — Details
data.description:
Bitcoin mining is entering a new era in Japan, where it’s no longer viewed as an energy drain. The transformation is being spearheaded by Canaan (CAN), a forward-thinking initiative that integrates BTC mining into Japan’s renewable energy ecosystem to balance power demand and supply. This Is How Bitcoin Fits Into National Energy Policy In an X post, crypto analyst TheGentleTraveler has shed light on a significant and innovative development at the intersection of Bitcoin mining and energy infrastructure. source: https://www.newsbtc.com/news/bitcoin/bitcoin-mining-in-japan/

data.title: Altcoin Season Index Shows Recovery in Cryptocurrency Market
data.description:
According to BlockBeats, data from Coinmarketcap indicates that the Altcoin Season Index has risen to 32, following a previous dip to 23 on October 23. This index reveals that over the past 90 days, approximately 32 out of the top 100 cryptocurrencies by market capitalization have outperformed Bitcoin.

The CMC Altcoin Season Index serves as a real-time metric to assess whether the cryptocurrency market is currently dominated by altcoins. It is based on the performance of the top 100 altcoins relative to Bitcoin over the last 90 days.
